verbose_text: As Tashima showed for PGAP2 defective CHO cells, when only the removal of the sn2 linked fatty acid occurred because of inefficient PGAP2 dependent reacylation during fatty acid remodeling, GPI-APs became lyso-GPI-APs, and were transported to the cell surface and secreted.
evidence: GPI-APs became lyso-GPI-APs, and were transported to the cell surface
